mapper.select: select TMP_CONTENT, REMARK, INSERT_DT, INSERT_BY, UPDATE_DT, UPDATE_BY, TMP_CODE, IS_PERSONAL, RELATION, TMP_NAME, SCENE, IS_PROD_NAME, IS_PROD_URL, IS_PRICE, is_profit from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_TEMPLATE where TMP_CODE = #{code}::int4

select * from ( with v1 as (select TMP_CODE, string_agg(ACTIVITY_TYPE, ',' order by SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE ) SCENE from ( select TMP_CODE, t2.ACTIVITY_TYPE, t2.SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_TEMPLATE t1 left join UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP t2 on t1.TMP_CODE = t2.SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE group by TMP_CODE, ACTIVITY_TYPE, SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE ) v11 group by TMP_CODE), v2 as ( select TMP_CODE, string_agg(GROUP_ID::varchar, ',' order by SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE asc) relation from ( select TMP_CODE, t2.GROUP_ID, t2.SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_TEMPLATE t1 left join UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP t2 on t1.TMP_CODE = t2.SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE group by TMP_CODE, GROUP_ID, SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE ) v21 group by TMP_CODE ) select t.TMP_CODE, t.TMP_NAME, t.TMP_CONTENT, t.IS_PERSONAL, v1.SCENE, t.insert_dt, case when v2.relation in ('5', '8') then 'LATENT' when v2.relation is not null then 'GROWTH,LATENT' end relation from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_TEMPLATE t, v1, v2 where t.TMP_CODE = v1.TMP_CODE and t.TMP_CODE = v2.TMP_CODE order by TMP_CODE desc ) tmp1 where 1=1
and TMP_NAME like concat('%', #{activityTemplate.name} ,'%')
and IS_PERSONAL = #{activityTemplate.isPersonal}
and relation like concat('%', #{activityTemplate.relation} ,'%')
and scene like concat('%', #{activityTemplate.scene} ,'%')
mapper.update: update UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP set SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE = #{tmpCode}::int4 where GROUP_ID = #{groupId}::int4 and HEAD_ID = #{headId}::int4 and ACTIVITY_TYPE = #{type} and ACTIVITY_STAGE = #{stage}
mapper.select: select count(1) from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP t1, UO_OP_ACTIVITY_HEADER t2 where t1.HEAD_ID = t2.HEAD_ID and (t2.PREHEAT_STATUS <> 'done' and t2.FORMAL_STATUS <> 'done') and t1.SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE = #{tmpCode}::int4
mapper.update: update UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP set check_flag=t3.check_flag, check_comments=t3.check_comments from ( select t1.group_id, (case when t1.SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE is null and t2.group_id is not null then 'N' when t1.SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE is not null and t2.group_id is not null then 'Y' else 'NA' end) check_flag, (case when t1.SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE is null and t2.group_id is not null then '群组文案未配置' else '' end ) check_comments from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP t1 left join (select distinct group_id from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PRODUCT where HEAD_ID = #{headId} and activity_stage=#{stage}) t2 on t1.head_id=#{headId} and t1.group_id=t2.group_id ) t3 where UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.group_id=t3.group_id and UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.HEAD_ID = #{headId} and UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.ACTIVITY_STAGE = #{stage}

update UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP set SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE = null, CHECK_FLAG = 'N', CHECK_COMMENTS = '群组文案没有配置' where head_id = #{headId}::int4 and ACTIVITY_STAGE = #{stage} and GROUP_ID = #{groupId}::int4 and activity_type = #{type}
